statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC, category DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Shopping' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM financial_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS transactions_count FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY category ORDER BY transactions_count DESC;
SELECT description FROM financial_data WHERE description LIKE '%groceries%' OR description LIKE '%shopping%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, amount, category, date FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, category, amount, date FROM financial_data WHERE category='Groceries' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, amount, date, category FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, date, category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category='Utilities' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) FROM financial_data GROUP BY category HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT f.id, f.date, f.amount, b.year, b.month, b.budget FROM financial_data f INNER JOIN budget_data b ON f.date = b.year AND f.category = 'Food';
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT date, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT decision_id, decision_description FROM budget_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses, SUM(profit) AS total_profit FROM financial_data;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_description FROM financial_trends WHERE trend_id = 5;
SELECT decision_description, decision_date FROM budget_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(revenue), SUM(expenses) FROM financial_data GROUP BY date HAVING SUM(profit) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY expenses DESC, profit ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans;
SELECT plan_id, year, total_budget FROM budget_plans ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT expense_category, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_id, source_name, total_income FROM income_sources ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE year = 2021 AND report_type = 'quarterly';
SELECT * FROM budget_plans ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT plan_id, total_budget FROM budget_plans WHERE year = 2022
SELECT expense_category, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_category ORDER BY total_expense DESC
SELECT rp.year, rp.report_type, fs.total_income FROM financial_reports rp JOIN income_sources fs ON rp.year = fs.source_name
SELECT bs.source_name, SUM(fs.total_income) AS total_income FROM income_sources bs JOIN financial_reports fs ON bs.source_id = fs.report_id GROUP BY bs.source_name
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE expenses > 10000;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans WHERE total_budget > 50000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT date, investment_type, amount FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' AND amount > 1000;
SELECT id, year, trend_description FROM financial_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, revenue, expenses FROM financial_summary WHERE total_revenue > total_expenses;
SELECT year, total_budget AS budget, allocated_budget AS allocated FROM budget_plans WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' AND amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, year, trend_description FROM financial_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC;
